Wisdom: الشَّهَوَاتُ آفَاتٌ قَاتِلَاتٌ وَخَيْرُ دَوَائِهَا اقْتِنَاءُ الصَّبْرِ عَنْهَا
enWisdom: Lustful desires are fatal diseases, and the best cure for them is acquiring patience against them

Wisdom: مَنْ تَسَرَّعَ إِلَى الشَّهَوَاتِ تَسَرَّعَ إِلَيْهِ الْآفَاتُ
enWisdom: Whoever hastens towards lustful desires, afflictions rush towards him
One who makes a habit of following [his] lustful desires is overwhelmed by afflictions, is associated with evils and has certainty about the permanence [of this world]
